support.name: Rdentify
support.short_description: Detect vulnerability from your customer interactions
support.long_description: Rdentify detects vulnerabilities through AI to keep you compliant and your customers protected.
support.installation_instructions: Install this app and connect your Rdentify account to Zendesk by speaking to your account manager.
